author: rhuijben
msg: Update svn_client_add() implementation to use not deprecated functions and to
(add_file): Take abspath and no access baton.
(add_dir_recursive): Take abspath and no access baton.
(add): Take abspath and no access baton.
(svn_client_add4): Combine errors, pass abspath and add note on access

author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r39338, r39340, add the option of flushing the entries
cache to the remove entry and set depth database calls.
svn_wc__db_temp_op_set_dir_depth): Add parameter for flushing entries
and use navigate_to_parent to find the parent pdh.

author: rhuijben
msg: * build.conf: Following up on r39345, fix the Windows build

author: joeswatosh
msg: Fix misunderstanding of relative path when getting an update or switch
editor from the Svn::Wc::AdmAccess.  Formerly, these worked with either a
path relative to the current directory OR the working copy.  Now they work
as documented and must be relative to the working copy.
Svn::Wc::AdmAccess#switch_editor to pass in a working copy relative path
instead of a current directory relative path.

author: joeswatosh
msg: Fix Ruby binding test so that it doesn't leave an unclosed handle to the
wc.db file that can't be deleted during TestCase#cleanup on windows and
fouls up the setup of the next test.
that can't be destroyed and doesn't affect the test outcome.
